document.full_text: wilson chandler hit a go-ahead jumper with 29.3 seconds remaining and the denver nuggets beat the san antonio spurs 115-112 wednesday night.
document.title: in first game without duncan, spurs fall to harrington, nuggets
lines_and_colors: wilson chandler hit a go-ahead jumper with 29.3 seconds remaining and the denver nuggets beat the san antonio spurs 115-112 wednesday night.
